      • validMove

        public boolean validMove​(Board board,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Checks if the current move is valid
        Parameters:
        board - ,the board on which the move is tested on
        x - for the x axis position to move to
        y - for the y axis position to move to
        Returns:
        false because figure object can't move

      • move

        public Boolean move​(Board board,
                    int pos1from,
                    int pos2from,
                    String posTo)
        method to move the figures on the board
        Parameters:
        board - board on which the figure is moved on
        pos1from - x axis position where the figure is moved from
        pos2from - y axis position where the figure is moved from
        posTo - x and y axis position where the figure is moved to
        Returns:
        true if figure has been moved

      • move2

        public static boolean move2​(Board board,
                            int pos1from,
                            int pos2from,
                            String posTo)
        method to check if move is valid
        Parameters:
        board - the board the move is on
        pos1from - the x axis position of the starting field
        pos2from - the y axis position of the starting field
        posTo - the x and y axis position of the field to move to
        Returns:
        false if move not valid, else go on to move22

      • move4

        public static boolean move4​(Board board,
                            int pos1from,
                            int pos2from,
                            String posTo)
        method to check if black is in check after black's move
        Parameters:
        board - the board the move is on
        pos1from - the x axis position of the starting field
        pos2from - the y axis position of the starting field
        posTo - the x and y axis position of the field to move to
        Returns:
        true if no check, false if black in check after the move or go on to check4

      • check4

        posTo - the x and y axis position of the field to move to

      • hasPossibleMove

        public Boolean hasPossibleMove​(Board board,
                               int pos1from,
                               int pos2from,
                               String To)
        method to check if figures on the board have possible moves
        Parameters:
        board - board on which the figure is on
        pos1from - x axis position where the figure is moved from
        pos2from - y axis position where the figure is moved from
        To - x and y axis position where the figure is moved to
        Returns:
        true if figure has at least one possible move

      • hasPossibleMove2

        public static Boolean hasPossibleMove2​(Board board,
                                       int pos1from,
                                       int pos2from,
                                       String To)
        method to check if there is check after the move
        Parameters:
        board - the board the move is on
        pos1from - the x axis position of the starting field
        pos2from - the y axis position of the starting field
        To - the x and y axis position of the field to move to
        Returns:
        true if no check
